Question: As a child, this person vacationed at Castle Hill, the Cranes' summer estate in Ipswich, Massachusetts.
Hints: This person's maternal grandmother was an opera singer who performed several times at Carnegie Hall.
In 1976 this person was the first member of the original cast to leave the show, after his contract ended.
This person made a few cameo appearances as the second season wound down; he was eventually replaced by Bill Murray.
